Description: Magical gem; intaglio; lapis lazuli; bevelled edge; engraved on obverse: Harpocrates seated on lotus flower with flail; two buds; inscribed.
Bibliographic references: Michel 2001 / Die Magischen Gemmen im Britischen Museum (104)
Bonner 1950 / Studies in magical amulets, chiefly Graeco-Egyptian
